column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A------ suspect was detained by the Royal Cambodian Armed Forces (RCAF) after he had taken a bag from a foreigner at 2:00 pm on February 1
column8: Phnom Penh.------The suspect was named as Va Makar
column12: a 33-year-old Chinese national is staying at NagaWorld Hotel.------The suspect was caught with the victim’s bag containing ID
column13: $400 and an iPhone. These were later handed back to the victim.------The suspects was sent to the Criminal Investigation Bureau of the Royal Gendarmerie of Phnom Penh for further action. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/410763
